Articles.Content:
Floor 3294: You look at your signs and find one that says Marshmallow testing Factory.

You look around and see people bouncing around on huge soft cylinders of white and pink.

Floor 3295: Pinkwhite pin quite.

(Idk if it's grammatically correct even approximately, but couldn't refrain from writing.)

(Yes, the form was prevailing over content. It's bad, I know.)

Floor 3296: You pull out a sign that says "Tron Room"

You spend the next hour dodging flying discs. You manage to catch one and take it with you.
Floor 3297: A head of somebody who jumped too high while dodging, sticking out from the hole in the floor.

Floor 3298: You found out that the building has infinite levels. 

Contact SCP foundation, GOC or whatever it is. Just make sure they can handle supernatural stuffs and get you outta here. 

 

Edited February 19, 2023 by Abel Military Services
Floor 3299: The previous SCP Foundation contactor's body.
Floor 3300: You pull out a sign that says there will be a special prize in 33 floors from now.
Floor number Threeeleven and one.
Floor 3302: Indoor hang gliding club. You spend hours soaring around the floor.
Floor 3303: spiked club
Floor 3304: Spike Milligan and the Goon show.
Floor 3305: A spikey mini-gun.
Floor 3306: Factory to produce Nerf Vulcan cannons. Guarenteed to tickle you to death at a 1000 rounds a minute.
Floor 3307: The volcanic smoke.
Floor 3308: Tonga trench
Floor 3309: Volga river.
Floor 3310: A company that makes extremely accurate 1:1000 scale landscapes.

Floor 3311: An 1:1000 voodoo globe to magically rule the Earth.

With pins.
Floor 3312: a piece of irradiated graphite with googly eyes siting on a pedestal in a 5x5 meter enclosed and hermetically sealed - wait this is the wrong forum.

18 minutes ago, NovaSuper said:

Floor 3312: a piece of irradiated graphite with googly eyes siting on a pedestal in a 5x5 meter enclosed and hermetically sealed - wait this is the wrong forum.

Floor 3313: A Picture of me wanting an explanation

Edited March 1, 2023 by Admiral Fluffy
also a picture of me correcting my spelling errors
Floor 3314: A bookshelf with full explanation of that picture.

Floor 3315: An Art gallery with paintings of books that explain things. There is a beautiful one that shows a grazing Theasaurus in a lush rain forest.

Edited March 1, 2023 by ColdJ
Floor 3316: The microbiological part  of the gallery. Pictures of InFusoriae, OutFusoriae, and Vocabulariae.
Floor 3317: Physarum Polycephalum
Floor 3318: Holy kraken! It's the fabled Restock Waterfall Expansion 0.4.0!! Wait, never mind. It's too buggy.
